required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Twelve -Month Study Observing How Insulin-naïve Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Manage Diabetes Using Toujeo® After Oral Antidiabetic Drug Failure, the Side Effect of Toujeo®, and The Cost.
clinical_study.official_title: A 12-month Prospective Observational Study Assessing the Real-world Clinical Effectiveness, Safety and Health-economic Benefits of Toujeo® Initiation After Oral Antidiabetic Drug Failure in Insulin-naïve Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

detailed_description.textblock: Patients will be observed for one year

primary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients achieving Hemoglobin A1c <7.0%.

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in HbA1c at 3, 6, and 12 months
Change from baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose at 3, 6, and 12 months
Change from baseline in Self-Monitored Plasma Glucose at 3, 6, and 12 months
Number of participants with symptomatic hypoglycemic events
Number of participants with Adverse Events
Number of participants with Serious Adverse Events

arm_group.description: Insulin glargine (U300) dosage and dosing time as per local product labeling

intervention.description: Pharmaceutical form: Solution for injection Route of administration: Subcutaneous injection

study_pop.textblock: Insulin-naïve patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and Oral Antidiabetic Drug failure

patient_data.ipd_description: Qualified researchers may request access to patient level data and related study documents including the clinical study report, study protocol with any amendments, blank case report form, statistical analysis plan, and dataset specifications. Patient level data will be anonymized and study documents will be redacted to protect the privacy of trial participants. Further details on Sanofi's data sharing criteria, eligible studies, and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.clinicalstudydatarequest.com/
